title: Won't give me RP when I purchased it!
body: I think this is stupid because i spent $10.00 for the RP for champions and skins but never gave me the RP! Wow! This is very unfair they even might be scamming us League Of Legends players!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Did you try the purchase on this account?  I don't see any record of a purchase on your account.  I can't currently look up payment information, but if it was a credit card purchase, I'd double check to make sure it went through.  Sometimes on failed transactions the funds can be held in a "pending" state for a few days by the card provider.

If it wasn't a credit card purchase or the payment is confirmed on your bank statements, go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look :D
i payed for rp today and didnt get it help plz
